A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm 47 and was around when Star Wars was released. I love the original trilogy. Nothing will ever come close but enjoyed Episode VIII. It wasn't fantastic but was as I expected. I enjoyed it more than Episode VII but not as much as Rogue One. I think the problem is movies are hyped up so much these days prior to release. Other than the first trailer I avoided pretty much everything including reviews and previews. I enjoyed it for what it was and am glad I saw it at the cinema.
